scripts.dev: npm run prebuild:kotlin && cd .kotlin-build && ./gradlew build && cd .. && npm run generate:types && concurrently "./.kotlin-build/gradlew -p .kotlin-build build --continuous -q" "vite"
scripts.build: npm run prebuild:kotlin && ./.kotlin-build/gradlew -p .kotlin-build build && npm run generate:types && vite build
